author: Sydney Morning Herald
title: Ground News - Queensland residents on rationed drinking water in heatwave conditions
text:
Summary by Sydney Morning Herald The water situation in parts of Queensland’s far north has turned critical in the wake of major landslides, with residents on rationed drinking water. Share menu More
